title: MSG Sports Considering Spinning Off Knicks, Rangers
description: Madison Square Garden Sports board of directors approved a plan to explore splitting the NBA’s New York Knicks from the NHL’s New York Rangers, a move that would make each team a separate publicly traded company. Bloomberg's Randall Williams reports on "Bloomberg Deals". (Source: Bloomberg)
